shri lankawedi pawathwimata niyamitha podurajya mandaliya rajya nayaka samuluwa sandaha brithanya dewani elisabeth maha rajina niyojanaya karamin otunna himi chals kumaru sahabhagi wimata niyamithawa atha.maha rajinage ayahapath saukhya thaththwaya hethuwen me sandaha chals kumaru sahabhagi karawimata thiranaya kara athayi bakinham maligaya eeye (07) prakashayata pathkaleya.elambaena nowambar masaye 15, 16 saha 17 dinayanhi kolambaadi pawathwena podu rajya mandaliya rajya nayaka samuluwa wenuwen brithanya maha rajina niyojanaya karamin chals kumaru sahabhagi wima agaya karana bawa widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya pawasayi.podurajya mandaliya samajika ratawal 54 ta ayath rajya nayakayan me samuluwa sandaha sahabhagi wimata niyamitha bawada ema amathyanshaya penwa deyi.ayahapath saukhya thaththwaya hethuwen landan nuwaradi pawathwena atham uthsawa awasthawan sandahada maha rajina sahabhagi nowu bawa penwadena widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya podu rajya mandaliya rajya nayaka samulu sandahada sahabhagi nowu awasthawan daknata labunu bawa kiyasiti.shri lankawe manawa himikam sambandhayen atham parshawayan wisin wiwidha matha palakarana kalawakawanuwaka me samuluwa shri lankawedi pawathwena bawada rajinage nopaminima ee ha sambandha siduwimak nowana bawada bakinham maligaya prakashakara atha.kese wuwada mema rajya nayaka samuluwa sandaha maha rajinage nopaminima thama rajakari chals kumaru wetha pawarima sandaha wiyahaki bawa jathyanthara wicharakayo penwa dethi.shri lankawedi pawathwena podurajya mandaliya rajya nayaka samuluwa sandaha sahabhagi wana bawata oostreliyawa, nawasilanthaya, brithanyaya saha papuwa niwginiya ratawal danatamath danum di thibe..
